name: Anthony M. Scotti
objective: I am seeking a position where I can work on improving my skills along with using the skills I have gathered as a software developer. I wish to be challenged intellectually and have the chance for growth.

experience.name: Net Atlantic, Inc.
experience.overview: Net Atlantic is an E-mail service provider and web hosting company. Working with clients to develop customize solutions and integration along with consultation to assist with reaching our client's goals.

experience.name: EBSCO Publishing

Develop new applications for in-house processing

Working with a number of departments on a single project
Automating out of house processes for faster turn time
